IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE COMPREHENSIVE FUNDING THAT ENHANCES SERVICES TO PEOPLE WITH COMPLEX DISABILITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES CHILDREN AND ADULTS WITH DISABILITIES THE RESOURCES THEY NEED TO ACHIEVE A FULLNESS OF LIFE AND REACH THEIR FULL POTENTIAL BY ESTABLISHING AND BUILDING RELATIONSHIPS WITH THOSE WHO HAVE RESOURCES TO REACH FAMILIES IN NEED AND TO TRANSFORM LIVES.
IRS990.Desc: THE PURPOSE OF MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION IS TO SOLICIT AND RECEIVE FUNDS AND OTHER PROPERTY OR INTEREST IN PROPERTY BY GIFT, GRANT OR BEQUEST AND TO ADMINISTER, INVEST OR DISBURSE SUCH FUNDS AND PROPERTY EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE BENEFIT AND SUPPORT OF MCGUIRE MEMORIAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SPECIAL EVENT DIRECT EXPENSES GAMING DIRECT EXPENSE
SPECIAL EVENTS DIRECT EXPENSES GAMING DIRECT EXPENSES
THE FOUNDATION'S ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF DONOR-RESTRICTED INVESTMENT FUNDS ESTABLISHED FOR THE PERPETUAL SUPPORT OF THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION.
PART XI, LINE 2D: SPECIAL EVENTS DIRECT EXPENSES: $201,987 PART XII, LINE 2D: SPECIAL EVENTS DIRECT EXPENSES: $201,987

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: ICF/ID LIFE ENRICHMENT RENOVATIONS, PRIVATE SCHOOL BEHAVIOR THERAPY SERVICES, ACQUISITION COSTS OF NEW COMMUNITY HOME, FUNDS TO COVER OPERATING LOSS

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: OUR LADY OF SACRED HEART HIGH SCHOOL

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SPEND DOWN UNUSED SCHOLARSHIP MONIES AS REQUIRED BY THE PENNSYLVANIA TO A QUALIFIED ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES WRITTEN REQUESTS FOR FUNDING ASSISTANCE FROM ITS SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION. THE FILING ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS EACH REQUEST AND DETERMINES IF FUNDING IS AVAILABLE. IF PROJECTS OF THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION ARE FUNDED, THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION PROVIDES DOCUMENTATION AND REPORTS TO THE FILING ORGANIZATION REGARDING SPECIFIC PROJECTS FOR WHICH FUNDING WAS RECEIVED. IN ADDITION, A REPRESENTATIVE OF THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION ATTENDS BOARD MEETINGS OF THE ORGANIZATION AND PROVIDES PROJECT PROGRESS UPDATES AS NEEDED. UPON COMPLETION OF PROJECTS, THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION PROVIDES INVOICES AND RECEIPTS FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S RECORDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SINGULAR REPRESENTATIVES OF THE DIOCESE OF PITTSBURGH, FELICIAN SISTERS OF NORTH AMERICA AND ONE "AT-LARGE" INDIVIDUAL AND INDEPENDENT MEMBER WILL MAKE UP,IN TOTALITY, THE CORPORATE MEMBER OF THE MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS OF THE MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE APPOINTED BY THE CORPORATE MEMBER. A NOMINATING COMMITTEE IDENTIFIES POTENTIAL CANDIDATES FOR NOMINATION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE OFFICERS SHALL BE ELECTED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SOME DECISIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS, SUCH AS CAPITAL CAMPAIGN ACTIVITIES AND CHANGES TO THE ORGANIZATION'S ORGANIZING DOCUMENTS, ARE SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY THE MEMBERS OF THE MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION'S CORPORATE MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION. AFTER REVIEW, THE FINAL FORM 990 WAS PRESENTED TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS ARE PROVIDED TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR COMPLETION. BOARD MEMBERS RETURN THEIR COMPLETED DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FOR REVIEW. ANY CONFLICTS WOULD BE BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD PRESIDENT. THE OPERATIONAL ACTIVITIES OF MCGUIRE MEMORIAL FOUNDATION ARE GOVERNED BY THE DOCUMENT DESTRUCTION AND WHISTLEBLOWER POLICIES OF MCGUIRE ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST TO INQUIRING PARTIES.
NO CHANGES TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT REVIEW PROCESS HAVE OCCURED DURING THE YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: RESIDENTIAL SUPPORT FOR PERSONS WITH INTELLECTUAL AND PHYSICAL DISABILITIES
PROVISION OF ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES TO MCGUIRE MEMORIAL
HUD SECTION 811 PROJECT HOUSING FOR THE DISABLED
